casebody.data:
2002-2006 (La. 10/25/02)

Louise SIMON v. SEARS, ROEBUCK AND COMPANY and Liberty Mutual Insurance Company. No. 2002-C-2006. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Simon, Louise; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 464-251; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 CA 1607.

Denied.
